name: Citanul Hierophants
oracle_text: Creatures you control have "{T}: Add {G}."
flavor_text: From deep in the caves beneath the forest, the hierophants planned the druids' raids against the enemy.

name: Cinder Glade
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
Cinder Glade enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
flavor_text: On the volcanic continent of Akoum, bizarre vegetation clusters around gas vents, and jagged mountain peaks rise high into the air.

name: Cinder Barrens
oracle_text:
Cinder Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
flavor_text: A mudflow swallowed the lowlands years ago. All that remains are a bottomless mire and an endless rain of ash.

name: Choked Estuary
oracle_text:
As Choked Estuary enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Swamp card from your hand. If you don't, Choked Estuary enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

name: Chaos Warp
oracle_text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

name: Champion of the Perished
oracle_text: Whenever another Zombie enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of the Perished.
flavor_text: He rose from the graf for every cobbler, tanner, and fool who'd been slaughtered in the parish@-and they rose and shambled after him.

name: Champion of Lambholt
oracle_text:
Creatures with power less than Champion of Lambholt's power can't block creatures you control.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of Lambholt.

name: Chain Reaction
oracle_text: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"We train for the improbable, like lightning striking the same place twice, or striking everywhere at once."
@-Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

name: Cemetery Reaper
oracle_text:
Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.
{2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text: Every grave cradles a recruit.

name: Cartographer's Hawk
oracle_text:
Flying
When Cartographer's Hawk deals combat damage to a player who controls more lands than you, return it to its owner's hand. If you do, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Canopy Vista
oracle_text:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
Canopy Vista enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
flavor_text: The continent of Murasa lies beneath a blanket of dense vegetation, its enormous branches tangled so thickly that some inhabitants never see the ground.

name: Camaraderie
oracle_text: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures you control. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Within the song of Mat'Selesnya, one becomes all."
@-Heruj, Selesnya hierophant

name: Burnished Hart
oracle_text: {3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Forged by divine hands to wander mortal realms.

name: Breath of Malfegor
oracle_text: Breath of Malfegor deals 5 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: The blood of the demons quickened as their master rose over the battlefield. The blood of the angels also quickened: here was the chance to finally end the war started millennia ago.

name: Brash Taunter
oracle_text:
Indestructible
Whenever Brash Taunter is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.
{2}{R}, {T}: Brash Taunter fights another target creature.
flavor_text: "You hit like a kobold!"

name: Blossoming Sands
oracle_text:
Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped.
When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

name: Blossoming Defense
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn.
flavor_text: Those who move harmoniously with the flow of aether can channel the power of the natural world.

name: Bloodgift Demon
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, target player draws a card and loses 1 life.
flavor_text: He relishes the devotion of his Skirsdag puppets and their belief that it will earn them immortality.

name: Bloodfell Caves
oracle_text:
Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped.
When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

name: Blasphemous Act
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.
Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.
flavor_text:
"Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything."
@-Thalia, Knight-Cathar

name: Bident of Thassa
oracle_text:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
{1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.
flavor_text: The wills of mortals shift as the tide ebbs and flows.

name: Beast Within
oracle_text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
flavor_text:
"Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them."
@-Euphemia, Nexus watcher

name: Banishing Light
oracle_text: When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield.
flavor_text:
The Champion reached for a stone, and Heliod placed the sun into her hand.
@-The Theriad

name: Azorius Signet
flavor_text: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law@-strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

name: Aven Gagglemaster
oracle_text:
Flying
When Aven Gagglemaster enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature you control with flying.
flavor_text: An aven's gear is enchanted to avoid weighing them down during aerial maneuvers.

name: Avacyn's Pilgrim
oracle_text: {T}: Add {W}.
flavor_text: "Avacyn's protection is everywhere. From the holy church to the sacred glade, all that we see is under her blessed watch."

name: Aura Mutation
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that enchantment's mana value.
flavor_text:
"Nature has a way of adapting to and overcoming any force that seeks its end."
@-Vivien Reid

name: Atarka Monument
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
{4}{R}{G}: Atarka Monument becomes a 4/4 red and green Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: Atarka is worshipped and fed by her subjects at Ayagor, the Dragon's Bowl.

name: Army of the Damned
oracle_text:
Create thirteen tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
Flashback {7}{B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: Sometimes death comes knocking. Sometimes it tears down the walls.

name: Archon of Redemption
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Archon of Redemption or another creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain life equal to that creature's power.
flavor_text: Until Emeria is freed, he raises his sword in her name.

name: Archfiend of Depravity
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of each opponent's end step, that player chooses up to two creatures they control, then sacrifices the rest.
flavor_text: "Why would I kill you all? Who then would be left to worship me?"

name: Arcane Signet
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

name: Angler Turtle
oracle_text:
Hexproof
Creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.
flavor_text: It is ancient, immense, and irresistible.

name: Ambition's Cost
oracle_text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
flavor_text:
"Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier."
@-Ob Nixilis

name: Akoum Refuge
oracle_text:
Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.
When Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

name: Akoum Hellkite
oracle_text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Akoum Hellkite deals 1 damage to any target. If that land is a Mountain, Akoum Hellkite deals 2 damage instead.

name: Ajani, Caller of the Pride
oracle_text:
+1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
−3: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn.
−8: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens, where X is your life total.

name: Aetherize
oracle_text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.
flavor_text: "You can come back once you've learned some manners@-and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."

name: Absorb
oracle_text: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "Your presumption is your downfall."

name: Abrade
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: The Falkenrath progenitor was a vicious falconer, and the line is quick to remind others of its heritage.

name: Penregon Besieged
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your end step, choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures your opponents control. It perpetually gets -1/-1.
Whenever your opponents control no creatures, sacrifice Penregon Besieged.

name: Fallaji Antiquarian
oracle_text:
Haste
When Fallaji Antiquarian enters the battlefield, conjure a duplicate of another target nontoken creature or artifact you control into your graveyard. The duplicate perpetually gains {1}{R}.

name: Kayla's Kindling
oracle_text:
When Kayla's Kindling enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.
At the beginning of your upkeep, draft a card from Kayla's Kindling's spellbook and exile it. Until end of turn, you may cast that card.

name: Tomakul Phoenix
oracle_text:
Flying, haste
When Tomakul Phoenix dies, it perpetually gets +2/+2
At the beginning {X}{R}, where X is Tomakul Phoenix's power. If you do, return it from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Argothian Uprooting
oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on each of up to X target lands you control. They each become 0/0 Elemental creatures with reach, haste, and "When this creature leaves the battlefield, conjure a card named Forest onto the battlefield tapped." They're still lands.

name: Foundry Groundbreaker
oracle_text: When Foundry Groundbreaker enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land. Then conjure two cards named Foundry Groundbreaker's onto the battlefield tapped.

name: Sylvan Smite
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control if you weren't the starting player. Then that player deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

name: Argivian Welcome
oracle_text:
Destroy up to one target creature with power 4 or greater.
Choose a nonland card in your hand. It perpetually gains flash.

name: Crucias, Titan of the Waves
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, you may discard a card. If you do, create a Treasure token and choose ambitious or expedient. If you chose ambitious, seek a card with greater mana value than the discarded card. If you chose expedient, seek a card with elsser mana value than the discarded card.

name: Great Desert Hellion
oracle_text:
Starting intensity 1
Menace
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Great Desert Hellion unless you discard a card. If you discard a card this weay, perpetually increase Great Desert Hellion's intensity by 1.
When Great Desert Hellion leaves the battlefield, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw cards equal to Great Desert Hellion's intensity.
